headline.main: PRO-ALLIED POLICY ANNOUNCED IN IRAN; Proposed Reforms Regarded as Attempt by New Shah to Keep Hold on Throne

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Sept. 20 -- Reports from foreign diplomatic circles in Ankara tonight indicated that the new Shah of Iran was making a desperate but probably unsuccessful attempt to retain his throne by a series of sweeping declarations and decrees designed to implement constitutional reforms and wipe out the corruptness of his father's reign.
abstract: pro-Allied policy announced by new Iran Shah

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
